solution_line_template: Yvette spent {alicia_sundae}+{brant_sundae}+{josh_sundae}+{yvette_sundae} = $<<{alicia_sundae}+{brant_sundae}+{josh_sundae}+{yvette_sundae}={sundae_total}>>{sundae_total} on ice cream sundaes
Her bill comes to ${sundae_total} and she leaves a {tip_percent*100}% tip for the waiter so that's {sundae_total}*{tip_percent} = ${tip_amount}
The bill was ${sundae_total} and she added a ${tip_amount} tip for a total of {sundae_total}+{tip_amount} = $<<{sundae_total}+{tip_amount}={final_bill}>>{final_bill}
